metadata.Title: CVE-2019-18936 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: UniValue::read() in UniValue before 1.0.5 allow attackers to cause a denial of service (the class internal data reaches an inconsistent state) via input data that triggers an error.

criterions.comment: libunivalue: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
